observations: The grid contains an arrangement of shape composed of one or more colored blocks.
The shape is repeated but with a different color for the output grid.
hypotheses: The output grid contains same structure as the input grid but with the color of each block changed to a different color.
The output grid contains the same shape but shrinks the shape to a different size and changes its color to a different color.
selected_rule: The output grid contains same structure as the input grid but with the color of each block changed to a different color.
step_plan: Identify the distinct shapes and their positions in the input grid.
For each shape, map its color to a new color.
Create an output grid with the same shapes in the same positions, but with their colors updated based on the color mapping.
